intro: Tilesia capitata, commonly known as the clustered tilesia, is a tropical shrub native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dense clusters of small, fragrant white flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a glossy texture.
